scripts.prepare: husky && npm run install-all && npm run env
scripts.install-all: (cd backend && npm install) && (cd frontend && npm install) && (cd services/reis && command -v poetry && poetry install || echo 'poetry not installed, skipping')
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:force: node scripts/run-tests.js --forceUsingRunningServices && cd frontend && npm run test
scripts.generate-apis: npm run generate-specs && npm run generate-clients
scripts.generate-specs: npm run generate-specs-backend && npm run generate-specs-reis
scripts.generate-clients: npm run generate-clients-frontend && npm run generate-clients-backend
scripts.generate-specs-reis: (cd ./services/reis && command -v poetry && poetry run python rei_s/generate_open_api.py || echo 'poetry not installed, skipping')
scripts.generate-clients-backend: cd ./backend && npm run generate-tools && npm run generate-reis && npm run generate-executor
